Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for about a week and I have to say I was disappointed with the overall picture quality in modest to low lighting situations. Overall I think is it a good well built camera it felt good in my hands, and was fast to load, zoom, and take pictures between shots (I purchased a good Class 10 SHDC memory card).This camera did well for outdoor pictures and pictures with good lighting, however it does lack quality when working at high ISO speeds. I really wanted to like this camera.Pros:Good physical sizebig screengreat zoomfast between picturesDid superb with landscape and close up pictures with adequate lightingAutofocus is great! I don't think I took too many blurry pictures when I took the time to setup the shot and allow the auto focus to focus.Cons:Didn't like the pictures taken indoors in moderate to low lighting. lots of static. I've added a couple of pictures to the gallery, one indoor and one outdoor mountain scene.Overall impression, good camera for the price, good features, fast. This is definitely a solid point and shoot for well lit shots, I probably could have tweaked and dialed in the settings to allow for better indoor pictures.I've ordered a canon ELPH 500 for about $25 more, this particular canon may not be around much longer as it has been replaced with a new model. I'll see how that goes.

Reviews.Title: Poor Service All Around
Reviews.Author: Vince
Reviews.Content: Let me get one thing out of the way: the camera is great. It was priced very reasonably and is still what I consider to be best-in-class for inexpensive digital cameras.Here's why it was priced so reasonably:Shipping from the original order was slow but not terrible - we ordered three things from three different US-based Amazon merchants and this was the last to arrive by two full business days, taking 7 business days. The camera looked unused BUT it was clearly an open box item, and it was advertised as new. The charger included with the camera didn't fit the battery (and the battery fit the camera, so the charger was obviously wrong) so I contacted the seller (Tek Depot) for a replacement charger. They apologized and said they would be shipping a new charger. At this point they were still on track for a 4/5 star review at worst. I understand things can sometimes be confused at the point of shipping. However, a full 8 days later we had not received any charger or any notification of shipping (or delay), so I contacted them again and asked when it would be delivered. They replied that they had JUST ordered it, that it would be coming directly from the manufacturer, and they would be contacting me again when they had a tracking number for me. Eight days to process a replacement charger seems ridiculous to me. So we waited. And waited. Two more days later, I still had no tracking number and no communication, so again I contacted them and asked for my tracking number. Their reply was that it had been shipped USPS and therefore would have no tracking number. Regular mail after almost three weeks of having an inoperable camera? Inexcusable. We finally received the replacement charger - and it's a knockoff from China. (It works, but it isn't what they said they were having shipped.) We will never again purchase from Tek Depot, and the only reason this product receives TWO stars is that the camera is indeed superb.

Reviews.Title: My New Pretty Red Camera
Reviews.Author: Phyllis E. Williams
Reviews.Content: Just got this product today and have been trying it out.  So far I am really impressed. The colors are great, the video clarity and color is great and it seems to be built solidly.  I am thinking I may need a bigger card than 8G for movies for a trip though, the videos take up a lot of space.  After I have more time with this camera I will write an update, but so far it seems great.  I am anxious to try all the options.  Thanks Amazon and Panasonic!

Reviews.Title: Failed the amusement park/running after 7 children test.
Reviews.Author: Xangalli
Reviews.Content: I wanted to love this camera. I also wanted to spend some time looking over the manual, take some test shots and make some comparisons. As I suspected, however, the latter (and now sadly the former) never happened.Shutter speed, even on burst mode, is terrible. Almost every shot that had any movement was blurry. Low lighting shots the same. The amount of time between pressing the shoot button and the flash/taking picture event was LONG. Most of the time my subject had already left the picture.My third problem with this camera is the extended zoom. The button for it is on the top right right next to the photo taking one. I'd be taking a photo and all of a sudden, it would do a crazy super zoom because it's pretty difficult to keep your finger away from that spot. Forget trying to hold it with one hand. Getting it back to where I wanted it took far longer than my subjects allowed for photo ops.One last thing I noticed which I have never experienced with any other camera (even my big fat SLR lenses) is that this camera appears to be a dust magnet. I am constantly having to remove dust from the lens. I wasn't taking photos in a dust storm. Is it getting in there when it is closed?!In summary, if you plan on taking pictures of immobile subjects, while standing perfectly still (never on a boat; even a stable, slow-moving one), then this may be the camera for you.I included a sample of photos. I'll be looking for another grab & go/point & shoot camera but for now I'm back to lugging my SLR.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Robinson
Reviews.Content: Excellente el producto, la camara tiene una resolucion increible y el envio fue super rapido, un excellente servicio que me brindo el proveedor.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: ADAM J CON
Reviews.Content: Took it to Germany. Worked flawlessly. Took over 700 pictures. A great camera for point and shoot.  Good motion control.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Mchad
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice camera with a ton of features and takes awesome pictures. Sleek design, OK battery life, easy to use, shoots great HD video (you have to zoom before you start recording if you need to zoom). Speed burst takes great action shots. Super fast. Great camera. 5 stars all the way.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Nomad
Reviews.Content: Great camera, able to take pictures most of the time without blur on moving targets!!aka babies! and pets who always tend to move when you want to take a picture

Reviews.Title: Quality outdoors is beautiful , low light indoor shooting is a bit fuzzy
Reviews.Author: uhhuduga
Reviews.Content: The camera takes some clear and crisp pictures when outside.However , in auto mode , I see a lot of fuzziness , kinda hazy pictures when am shooting indoors.If I use the flash indoors , it is a bit OK but still unsatisfactory . I understand that point and shoot cameras generally are not very good in low light/indoor conditions but my 4 year old canon takes much brighter and sharper images indoors and in low light. Anybody using it has some advice on some setting for low light?

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: MARÍA LUISA BORJAS
Reviews.Content: ESTOY SATISFECHA DEL DESEMPEÑO DE LA CÁMARA COMPRADA EN AMAZOM...ES EXTRAORDINARIA LA BELLEZA DE LAS FOTOS¡¡¡ [Panasonic DMC-FH25 16.1MP Digital Camera with 8x Wide Angle Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD ]¡¡FELICIDADES POR OFRECER CALIDAD DE PRODUCTOS Y SEGURIDAD EN LAS COMPRAS¡¡¡

Reviews.Title: Never misses a shot of my daughters!
Reviews.Author: Mom2ChannyAddy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in December of 2011 and love it!  Prior to purchasing it I tried many cameras but I hadn't found one that could keep up with my active daughters and kept missing important shots.  A friend who was a camera buff recommended this camera to me.  First I went and tried it out in a local store against other cameras.  The Cannon Sure Shot was recommended also but when I tried it out it took too much time between pictures.  My Lumix has been used at Disney World, Christmas Programs and Legoland Florida and the pictures look fantastic.  I may be just a point and shoot gal but this camera gives me professional looking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery, excellent camera. I have been very happy with my purchase of this camera. It takes very pretty, detailed photos and is lightweight. The battery is a flat rechargeable battery and it comes with the charger.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera to carry around every day
Reviews.Author: Vickie Klick
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great little camera for the price. I was replacing another pocket-sized point and shoot that got bounced one too many times on my bike, and my criteria were size, image quality, and zoom range (especially wide angle, which I'd had on my previous camera). I use a DSLR for "serious" shooting, but the point and shoot in my pocket gets a lot more use than the DSLR in the camera bag at home! The user interface is pretty intuitive for someone who's used Nikon and Canon point-and-shoots. There are a few oddities like the mechanical switch to go between playback and photo modes, but they aren't a big deal.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jerry  B
Reviews.Content: Great features, great zoom, high megapixel, compact and lightweight, east to use, great price, how can you go wrong. This is my second Panasonic. love them both.

Reviews.Title: Very good.
Reviews.Author: yang
Reviews.Content: I'm from South Korea to buy this product efforts have been made.So things are very pleased with the product I bought.Like a little toy to have the feelingOther than that, it is considered a very good product.Sell ''a lot of good products.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Patricia Mcintire "lv2rd"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace another I had that was same brand and similar. Have only had it 7 months and already it has issues. Won't open up and as I bought it online I think I am stuck with a defunct camera! Very disappointed as I did like my original Lumix but that too stopped working after a couple of years.

Reviews.Title: Meh.
Reviews.Author: Melissa "sesella_stellae"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I had the previous Panasonic model---it's okay, but for the price, I was expecting more. My current favorite is the Canon S110--a bit more expensive, but better overall. This one seems to be too in between the inexpensive and expensive models, and the picture quality isn't where it should be.

Reviews.Title: Worked okay for 1year
Reviews.Author: Michael Calabrese
Reviews.Content: Had this camera for 15mos. and it developed a focusing problem.  It worked okay up to this time.  There was no physical damage.  Panasonic customer service was no help.  I will not buy a Panasonic camera again.

Reviews.Title: An excellent low priced camera.
Reviews.Author: Jorge Goth Murtha "gothscl"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a reasonably priced camera which could fit comfortably in my shirt pocket. After thorough investigation among different brands, I decided for the Panasonic Lumix and I am extremely satisfied. It's a great point-and-shoot, pictures are truly good, it's easy to use and the battery lasts very long.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera.
Reviews.Author: matt michelotti
Reviews.Content: The different shooting modes are easy to use and result in some very good looking images. Just about the only negative that I have is when you have to use the flash it really chews through the battery. I know this is a problem with almost all cameras, but if that were improved this would diffidently get a 5 star ratting.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Cámara, Very GOOD.!!
Reviews.Author: Ali Linares "ALi"
Reviews.Content: This camera model acquired in early 2013 in the Electronic Direct store, which was sent to me in perfect condition, so I am very grateful. As for its operation, I must say that it has successfully fulfilled my expectations, with good resolution, sharp detail and good management of the colors. If there's any downside, it would be that some difficulty for low-light shooting without flash (dusk or in classroom). Rest consider fulfills its mission well and sometimes even superior compared to other cameras in the same price range. Highly Recommended.Este modelo de cámara la adquirí a principio del 2013 a la tienda Electronic Direct, la cual me la envió en perfecto estado, por lo que le estoy muy agradecido. En cuanto a su operatividad, debo decir que ha cumplido satisfactoriamente mis expectativas, con buena resolución, definición de detalles y buen manejo de los colores. Si hay algo de desventaja, seria esa cierta dificultad para las tomas con poca luz y sin flash (atardecer o dentro de salón). De resto considero cumple muy bien su misión e incluso superior en ocasiones en comparación con otras cámaras dentro del mismo rango de precios. Muy Recomendable.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Lyz
Reviews.Content: super good quality camera, takes nice pictures and fits everywhere, i would recomend to anyone looking for a cheap nice camera that taked good quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: debbiec98
Reviews.Content: Second camera just like this I bought. My first one quit working.  I paid more for the red one last time but the black is almost $100.00 cheaper.  Just nice to have when you don't want to use your smart phone.  Now I have two extra cords and extra battery so this camera is perfect for me.  It does take great pictures and small enough to put in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Swanny
Reviews.Content: Would give it 5 stars if it had a drop down viewer. But the compact design and the easy use is great!

Reviews.Title: I did love this...but...
Reviews.Author: Greg K.
Reviews.Content: I believe I got a good price for this.  The camera was everything that I wanted in it.  Great pictures, good video, decent features, battery life was acceptable...But...When I wasn't using it, I stored it in a dresser drawer, I figured it would be safe from dust and whatnot, but I was wrong.  After only about a month or two of not being used, somehow dust had gotten into the lens.  After contacting various cleaners and the company itself, the only option was to send it in to the company to get cleaned.  The fees would have cost MORE THAN THE CAMERA.  Unfortunately, I had to get rid of it.  It was great while I was using it, but I'm not going to take pictures with loads of specs showing up in each picture.If you get this, you need to invest in some type of protective storage case.

Reviews.Title: Good little travel camera
Reviews.Author: Desert Mom "AMH"
Reviews.Content: I bought this primarily because I was trying to find a point and shoot with a really small delay time between shots.  It is quicker than other point and shoot cameras I've had, but there is sometimes still difficulty with focusing that makes me miss the shot I want.  It also tends to overexpose with indoor shots, but it's definitely better than a camera phone.  It has been useful on vacations.

Reviews.Title: very good pictures
Reviews.Author: MBB
Reviews.Content: the camera is lightweight and takes very good pictures but you need take care by handling it, because it is all plastic!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: brenda
Reviews.Content: Love the camera! It's a much faster snap than my last one. Easy to carry. I haven't had any issues.

Reviews.Title: Blurry pictures most of the time -- except outstide
Reviews.Author: DotIowa
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for a couple of years. I thought 16 mp would mean sharp, crisp photos. Well, it doesn't. The colors are dull and the photos are not sharp -- except when I'm outside in sunlight. I've never been so disappointed in a digital camera. The only reason I didn't give this 1 star is because I like the compact size.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic DMC-FH25K rating comment
Reviews.Author: Tommy H.
Reviews.Content: I love the camera and everything about it with the ease of use but I do not like Panasonic Consumer Technical Support at 1-800-211-7262, they refused to help me on line because the model is over 24 months old with 2011 model year, this is unacceptable to me and due to this I would not buy this brand again, how is a customer to know the model year and stipulations of support when purchasing, I needed immediate help and chose to not follow through with their requests for additional help by sending in proof of purchase, I therefore when to web site and got an immediate answer through "how to" site.

Reviews.Title: It is okay
Reviews.Author: Mrs. A
Reviews.Content: This camera is just okay. Pictures taken without the flash on when inside come out terrible/blurry... but the flash is so bright when you use it isn't always very flattering. It works for the price, though.  If I could do it again I would've spent a little more for a nicer camera, though.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: E. Fegley "eliza"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter. Even though it was cheaper than the camera I bought for myself, it is so much easier to use and the pictures it takes are crisp and clear.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures in a small package.
Reviews.Author: LongPlay
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it!  A small camera that takes great pictures and fits in her purse of fanny pack.  She has taken it to Europe and the Caribbean and had had no problems.

Reviews.Title: No in-camera panorama.
Reviews.Author: deenibeeni
Reviews.Content: Great while it worked. Disappointing that the panorama view could not be done in-camera; i.e., you had to download the images and use their software  to stitch the images together. I hated that & was almost glad it ended up not working because the lens refused to open any more. I had insured it through squaretrade & they were perfect about it, as usual. For both of the above reasons, I wouldn't get this model again.

Reviews.Title: Lost the bet.  Problems with sticking shutter.
Reviews.Author: Kari C Hansen
Reviews.Content: I read multiple reviews before purchasing this camera and quite a few people mentioned the shutter sticking, or not opening with time.  I was sure that this wasn't going to happen to me and I went ahead and purchased the camera based on the good reports others had with it.  Well, I got a year out of it and then I developed the same problems with the shutter that had been mentioned.  So much for optimism working in my favor.  Don't take your chances with this one.  There have to be better options out there.

Reviews.Title: Be careful return policy is only 1 month
Reviews.Author: Sandi
Reviews.Content: Camera stopped taking pictures after 1 year...return policy is only 1 month. Read all of the fine print before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this camera!
Reviews.Author: Monica Pacheco-Tougas
Reviews.Content: Had to return this camera to Panasonic after about 5 months of use.  In two occasions, with two brand new cards (specs were as recommended by the camera) and all of a sudden we were not able to see the pictures we had taken seconds before and the camera even corrupted the card.  The pictures in the card were lost.  Panasonic service immediately acknowledge the failure and offered a refurbished camera but after months of waiting I called in desperation and requested my money back.  I sent the camera in September and I am still waiting for the check... Not a satisfied Panasonic customer!

Reviews.Title: Good deal!
Reviews.Author: kbrager
Reviews.Content: Once we played with a lot of the features and really learned how to use it, this camera take great 'action' pictures of our now 2 year old.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Kari Keener
Reviews.Content: I already had a larger Lumix but needed something small to carry around easily. This camera has many of the same great features as a bigger model and is easy to use, but small enough to fit in your pocket.  I recently traveled overseas and this was the only camera I took with me!  I would recommend Lumix to other amateur photo lovers, because it has performed well for me.

Reviews.Title: Was to replace the camera that I had
Reviews.Author: Linnie
Reviews.Content: Disappointed that when I received this camera it wouldn't hold the card.  It wouldn't lock in.  I had this same camera before and loved how it took pictures so ordered another one to replace it and found I can't put a card in it.

Reviews.Title: All you need in s small package
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great pictures and travels well. Have taken in on all vacations and bike rides and the pictures have turned out excellent. Easy to use, easy to carry and all the basic features needed.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: amy millar
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my mom for her birthday she loved it. Was easy to use and pretty. She liked the quality of the pictures as well.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: Used as gift and well liked by owner.  Great product.  Takes clear pics andHas anti shake mode for clarity.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: LSU Nurse
Reviews.Content: Took this with me to Ireland... very easy use, battery lasts most of the day (good considering I took over 2000 pictures in a 21 day trip. Charges easily, photos transport easily via SD card... what's not to love!This is a good "point and shoot" type camera. Be aware that if you're trying to capture motion shots (Sports) there is a setting for it specifically. Though I did not find that the shutter speed was sufficient to capture high action (such as sports or birds flying) but it does well enough for preventing that blurry wobble when you are taking photos in general.

Reviews.Title: great overall camera
Reviews.Author: Growing a Fashion Green Thumb
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for several months now and have not had any problems. Picture quality is great, the battery life is much better than most cameras in this price range, and the sound quality on the video was better than expected. The only reason it doesn't get that last star is that, while the preset modes are good, you can't fully customise your exposure, lighting, iso, etc. All of which I was kinda hoping to try out.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic DMC-FH25
Reviews.Author: Mondsee "WAM"
Reviews.Content: I dropped my Panasonic DMC-FH25, it did not survive, therefore immediately purchased the same model again because I very much like its features; I am not using it to do videos though; I recommend the camera,the price is right too.

Reviews.Title: Works very well
Reviews.Author: MARCELLE MOREL
Reviews.Content: great quality on photos... the only bad feature is a not friendly menu, little options to choose from. after that works very well, comfortable for carry and very good auto image

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Shawn Stiner
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera. It bigger sister the 14.1 mp camera has lots of cool features but this camera is a good entry level point and shoot

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Juan Jose Barreda A.
Reviews.Content: Camera is great, the zoom is pretty good, with de Leica lens, work perfectly.  Only need a couple of minutes to know wich configuration use depending on the place your are taking the picture and you are all set.

Reviews.Title: gotta get one
Reviews.Author: Sherri
Reviews.Content: I took my new camera on a cruise it was wonderful and my camera turned out some of the most beautiful pictures and I made great memories and hope to make more

Reviews.Title: My Wife Loves This Camera!
Reviews.Author: BigBlockBill
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a Christmas gift.  My wife is a real shutterbug with a pocket camera.  She likes the size and convenience of it, to say nothing about the great pictures it takes.  Photos are sharp and clear.  Other than the zooming, the camera is completely automatic.  She keeps it in her purse for any photo opportunity that she sees.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: D. Weatherly
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement, I had this same camera for a while and broke it recently So I order it as a replacement.  Love the zoom, takes awesome pics.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Pavane
Reviews.Content: I took this camera away with me and came back with some pretty crisp pictures. It is easy to handle & lightweight. Would recommend this camera as to its price and overall use and features. I also found a great book on getting started with photography Digital Photography (Computer Training)

Reviews.Title: does pictures ok
Reviews.Author: Roza
Reviews.Content: video is not good. I cant take videos is very bad  working. pictures are okay but video is not even I can take it so unclear and ...I don't know what is the problem.  I love to make videos but this camera ....is not for videos

Reviews.Title: best in small camera!
Reviews.Author: Min H.
Reviews.Content: I appreciate amazon reviewers.  I got information a lot form themcompact, reasonable price and good quality. Is there anything else.?

Reviews.Title: Good Pic
Reviews.Author: Rongresh32
Reviews.Content: I should have read the accessories. It did not come with a SD card. However the item is just like new. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great camara!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Love this camera with crisp pictures an video.  It is easy to handle, lightweight, and just an overall good camera.  Would recommend this camera as to its price and overall use and features.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Jimmie R. Napper "dog walker"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a 7 year old Panasonic and not disappointed in it. Zoom is great and the lens is far better then others I looked at in stores.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: KathyB
Reviews.Content: I won't write a lot, as the other reviews are excellent (and what prompted me to purchase this camera), but I have to say I am more than pleased with the quality of this item.  The pictures are excellent and the camera is so easy to use.  The shutter speed is fast enough to catch my grand kids in the act, which is exactly what I wanted. No more half-turned faces or blurry photos!  The delay time in every other camera (including my phone) is horrible compared to this Panasonic.  The battery lasts ages and is very easy to charge.  It is very lightweight and fits in your pants pocket when not being used, so you don't have to constantly hold it.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: No regrets...a great product!
Reviews.Author: David L Nesbit
Reviews.Content: I was looking for simplicity, but with good quality photos, video and easy to use features...this camera provides that at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Pictures
Reviews.Author: Monique E. Chauvin "flowerchild"
Reviews.Content: Love this compact camera.  The fact that you don't have to purchase batteries is definitely a plus.  Also, if you lose your computer cord it is easy to use the memory card for your pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: cookiemonster
Reviews.Content: This camera comes with an 8x wide angle, and takes great pictures. I love it!! Good for family functions and more.

Reviews.Title: Really good point and shoot.
Reviews.Author: Brian S
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for a few months now and really for the price I paid, I'm extremely satisfied with it.  The only issue I've encountered is that sometimes I have to fight with it to focus on the appropriate object.  Otherwise, no complaints.  Photo quality is really good for this type of camera and it's really easy, basic to use.  I do not regret the purchase at all and I'm very satisfied with the camera.

Reviews.Title: My little red camera
Reviews.Author: etssaa ohan
Reviews.Content: You know when I got this camera I was going to very happy because I lost my first one so here Im

Reviews.Title: Was really disappointed...
Reviews.Author: Eliareya
Reviews.Content: When I first got the camera I was pretty excited and started using it right away, and within I would say 20 - 25 shots the pictures started getting really grainy and there was always some weird looking blue dot on peoples faces and on environmental things. After that, I decided that maybe it was just my eyes and had someone else take pictures and still the same thing. Was really weird.Another thing was that the pictures were always blurry after the first few shots, as if a palsy diagnosee were using it and I was trying to get images of animals and plants and that just didn't cut. Not at all worth the time or money it took to get it. :(

Reviews.Title: Very good quality pictures..
Reviews.Author: VIcky Adhikari
Reviews.Content: Very good pictures.. The camera is a good one for beginners. Although i have now misplaced the charger and cant find it :(

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Inez P. Nordahl
Reviews.Content: Love my digital camera and it is much faster response time than the one I replaced.  Happy with the picture quality and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Michael Cook
Reviews.Content: we now have two Lumix cameras, They both take fantastic pics. Much better than our old cannons and fujis. love it

Reviews.Title: panasonic lumix camera
Reviews.Author: Stanley J. Foster
Reviews.Content: camera works great, the only problem I have found is it replaced a Kodak East Share and the battery does not have as much life as the Kodak.

Reviews.Title: Great simple point and shoot camera!
Reviews.Author: Eric Gamez
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my dad as a gift and he loves it.  If all you need is a simple point and shoot camera that takes decent pictures on auto focus, this is your camera.  It has other great features as well, but for professional photographers I probably would choose something better if you are looking for great pictures with more technical aspects.  Great value for the price!

Reviews.Title: this is the best camera!
Reviews.Author: special ops
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for almost 2 years. I bought from best buy. it's great with colors and lights. you don't need flash at night cuz you will be using the LEICA lens, if you don't know what's leica go google it. I'll put some pics out there so you can see.

Reviews.Title: Lumix is fantastic
Reviews.Author: A. Sanabria "amazon shopper"
Reviews.Content: I have had various brands of point and shoot digital camerasI am very happy with this oneExcellent picture quality

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Lcaruso
Reviews.Content: It's ok.  I just thought, it would have more "manual" possibilities.  Even though it's a point and shoot camera, ​I would prefer if it was possible to have more configurations and easy access to the menus.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic pocket camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Kluin
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I've had it for about two years now and have made thousands of pictures.  For a simple camera it works great.  Wtihout fiddling with it too much I can make great pictures.  What more could I want?  I would definitely recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Ron  C
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this camera. Takes beautiful pictures, Much better than the one it replaces. View finder works great in the sun which the other one did not,

Reviews.Title: Compact camera
Reviews.Author: Traveling Sandy "Traveler"
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera for many vacations and love the pictures it produces.  I do not take pictures with a phone, but can slip this small camera into a pocket and be ready for any photo ops that occur.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Ms. Li Lammert
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, simple to get started, takes terrific pictures.  Well worth the price!  Recommend it to anyone wanting a small camera.

Reviews.Title: High quality camera
Reviews.Author: Knightscross
Reviews.Content: Leica optics makes this camera outstanding. Campact, and well made, not to mention all the features it has.Panasonic seems to make great cameras lately

Reviews.Title: good photo quality
Reviews.Author: Lonnie Simon
Reviews.Content: I'm using it in low light situations due to glare and reflections. Works great for me in my business. It offers a accurate likeness of the actual products we sale.

Reviews.Title: a good basic point and shoot
Reviews.Author: HLGStrider "Elgee, Princess of Cats"
Reviews.Content: I'm by no means a photographer but I take a lot of pictures for personal enjoyment, mostly of my children. It suits my needs very well, is simple to use, only needs to be recharged once a month or so, and regains charge quickly when it does. So far it appears to be very sturdy. I got this to replace a similar panasonic that I had for about five years. It was impressively durable and managed to survive and be usable even with a slightly cracked display screen.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: AmberStef
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and takes great pictures. Rechargeable battery last a really long time. Importing photos to the computer is easy.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic DMC-FH25 16.1MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Dayton
Reviews.Content: Great camera; easy to use; great zoom; great photos in low light conditions.  It would be better if the camera came with a larger capacity battery or a spare battery.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: ash
Reviews.Content: this panasonic camera is a nice piece, it takes great shots of everything and is not that expensive... really cool

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Anon
Reviews.Content: This camera works very well. I am pleased with the auto-imaging software. This enables an effective "point and click" technique which works great for generally incompetent people like me.The only complaint that I have is in regards to nighttime/dark photographs. From my experience, which may be attributed to my naivety, I have not been able to take very clear and representative pictures in poor-lighting conditions.

Reviews.Title: DMC-FH25K
Reviews.Author: K. Schlinger
Reviews.Content: Was a gift. Seems to like it. Easy to use and very light and fairly small with good lens. Seems reliable.

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: AMR
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, photos have good resolution.  It was not effected by a very rainy day even though it is not waterproof.  My only complaint is that the buttons are small and close together but should be expected in such a compact camera.  It works great for what I got it for which is to have a camera that fits in a coat pocket for skiing, snowmobiling, hiking, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jim Glover
Reviews.Content: I liked this camera a lot.  Used it for months.  Unfortunately, I have a granddaughter that thought it looked good in the toilet so there is where she deposited it.  No work now but no fault of the camera.  Still was a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: leonard f doyle jr
Reviews.Content: Excellent Value. Exactly what I was looking for in a compact camera. Might consider an extra battery if you plan to take a large amount of pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Harleygirl
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use even my seven year old twin granddaughters take great pictures with my camera. I wanted this exact camera because my daughter and daughter in law have one and their pictures turn out so clear.

Reviews.Title: Great item for the value.
Reviews.Author: G. Letona
Reviews.Content: This tiny but powerful camera is the model that makes you understand the enormous difference between take some casual pictures with your fancy phone or take near professional pictures with an item that fits in your shirt pocket. Please forgive me the Sony lovers but this panasonic camera is the best in its category.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Katie D "katie-momof3"
Reviews.Content: My iPhone now takes pretty clear photos so I don't take a camera out much anymore. I give 4 stars because my daughter dropped this on a rock in the water- and it still worked! I'm impressed.

Reviews.Title: stunning quality at the price
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Collins "carefreeAZ"
Reviews.Content: I have used many many from box to SLR etc, but these panasonic digitals offer a tremendous quality and a bare bones price. Good lenses make a all the difference in cameras, that is why cell phone cameras produce poor quality photos.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic DMC Camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald Grishaber
Reviews.Content: I have taken so many photos with with camera.  Panasonic has did very well with this camera.  I have made quite a few Photo art photos....

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves her camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa C.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter for her 17th birthday gift. She had taken a photography class last year, so I wanted to get a camera that would take nice pictures. I read the Amazon reviews to help me with my decision. She is very happy with my choice. She likes that it takes decent dim light and high quality photos. We have two black cats, and my Kodak camera doesn't take very good pictures of them. I'm thinking maybe I should buy one of these for myself.

Reviews.Title: System Error (Zoom)
Reviews.Author: Paulette Lee "darwin33"
Reviews.Content: After 4 month of 2-3 times a week use I got the "System Error (Zoom)". The crazy thing is that I had been using it just fine 10 min before, and in that interval, it never left my hand. When I went to power it on again I got the error message and it has never worked after that. I wanted to really like this camera, and when I first got it I did, but as I took more pictures I liked it less and less. Really not great quality shots and the flash is horrible. I won't go into any more detail because what's the point after the the death error.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Luis Baluche
Reviews.Content: hello, good morning this product is very good, recomendhello, good morning this product is very good, recomendhello, good morning this product is very good, recomend

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: I previously had the Nikon Koolpics which was cheap and didn't last very long. This camera is sturdy, easy to operate and takes very clear pictures. The video function has been useful since I have two young children and it has worked well.

Reviews.Title: Loving this camera
Reviews.Author: Regina Ewell
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this camera.  I have 4 kids, one of them a toddler and I find this camera to work so well at capturing great pictures of them.  It is simple, not over complicated but has enough features that I have great options.  It is so light weight and takes pictures much faster than my other cameras.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: Love the camera and especially the digital zoom.  I'm getting great photos with ease.  Once you figure out the settings it's easy point & shoot.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix camera
Reviews.Author: Grant Irwin
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, Easy to use and has high quality resolution. It is easy to download pictures and send them to friends.

Reviews.Title: Okay Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Stevenson
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research I bought my first Panasonic camera. Loved the Canon's and liked the Kodak's. I really wanted to like this camera, and for the most part I did. It performed decent on a few vacations. My biggest problem was the focusing and the amount of time it took to get a nice shot. The time to snap the shot in focus was very frustrating when I was trying to catch shots of a lizard in a tree. 2/3's came out great but the others were blurry. This is my 4 camera and I recently got my first Sony which was the WX150 and now I realize what I was missing. The intelligent lens! Quicker and clearer shots more like the Canon's I was used too. With some patience I could of dealt with this Lumix but its on the shelf for now.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Enrique Weddle
Reviews.Content: excellent product, I commend you for your service. will recommend to my friends and family. next purchase will be provided to your store.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: GIANCARLOS BRAY CASTELLANOS
Reviews.Content: Very recommended camera, great resolution and relatively easy to use. I bought it for my wife and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: teen
Reviews.Content: I love my camera. Its simple and basic. If you are looking for touch screen, or anything that looks fancy this isn't for you. I love this camera because it is simple and takes beautiful pictures!

Reviews.Title: Great price--  Great camera
Reviews.Author: JEFF
Reviews.Content: This is my first Panasonic digital camera.  I was amazed by the quality ofthe photos.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Best compact camera ever!
Reviews.Author: marimikk
Reviews.Content: I love this! it has so many options & is small & easy to carry. I have had 2 other Panasonic digital cameras  (one was dropped on the driveway & died) & will continue with Panasonic.I love the auto adjust & the 8x optical lens. Between this and my FZ28, I can take fantastic photos & videos where ever I go.

Reviews.Title: This is a great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Noreen Ajaz
Reviews.Content: This is a great product!  Easy to use but also has many more modes for more advanced picture taking when your ready.  Product was shipped fast, in perfect condition, Great seller, Thanks again!!

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Janis L Loux
Reviews.Content: This is a good little camera for someone like me who wants to point and shoot. Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: M. G. Poe "Mama Grace"
Reviews.Content: It is just what I wanted and is easy to use. Would  highly recommend it to any amateur "picture taker."

Reviews.Title: Holy balls...
Reviews.Author: Tyler Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for a christmas present. we went on vacation and i was amazed at the picture quality. i dont have any negative things to say about it. its a great camera for non-pro people who like to take pictures of everything.but make sure you have a big sd card. the pictures are large.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Huy Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Very good picture quality.  Get a fast memory card, it will speed up boot time & picture taking time.  I got my dad & my mother in-law one as well

Reviews.Title: Great for my use
Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: I have very little experience with cameras. I use my smartphone more than anything which says something. Needless to say, my experience with this camera is great so far. The only downside I've noticed is that the picture quality is really grainy if you zoom in to take a look at the details but since I will only use it to post on facebook, send to my mom, or share with friends, it's pretty good. The pictures I take in the dark with this camera definitely beats my canon so that's definitely a plus.Update: another downside is that you can't zoom when taking a video.

Reviews.Title: Makes most all photos look good
Reviews.Author: LRVA
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. All the different settings under the "SCN" function are great and make pictures come out relatively good all the time. My favorite setting to leave on is the "Happy" mode, which seems to make all the colors more vibrant and warm. Also, it has a great zoom. It's a good purchase all around.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this product!
Reviews.Author: myview4u
Reviews.Content: Once I read and understood what and how to use it, I learn how easy it is and great it is for great pictures.  Thank You for great deal!

Reviews.Title: fair camera
Reviews.Author: mdm
Reviews.Content: fair camera. Good for making quick pictures. The battery is great and last enough time. The quality of the pictures is ok.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic DMC-FH25A  16.1 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Tindell
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and takes excellent pictures. I am quite happy with this camera. Quite surprised that it was so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Roy West
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera upgrade from my old canon elph.  I really like how easy it is to use.

Reviews.Title: Easy to carry
Reviews.Author: Don "Running biologist"
Reviews.Content: Does everything I want it to and is easier to carry than my big camera.  Battery holds a charge even after a day of photos and videos.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: CFSI
Reviews.Content: I'm a big fan of panasonic. I was amazed at how lightweight the camera was. The color was exactly as advertised. Start up time is very fast and the shots are fantastic with lots of easy to use features for the novice and professional alike.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Foristell
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is pretty good, but it's too slow to process the picture and get ready for the next. Also, mine broke (under warranty, and was replaced). I know, it wasn't the most expensive camera out there, but it could be better for the price.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera for under $200
Reviews.Author: BUDDHA
Reviews.Content: Things I like:  -Great pictures  - Price  -Size  -Zoom  -Battery life decent  -Nice size display  -HD videoComplaints:  -Sometimes I find myself looking for the ideal settings and I don't like how you have navigate to this area. More of  persoanal thing, than how the camera actually performs.Summary:  -If your looking for a moderately priced camera to take on vacation that easily slips into your pockets or purse, this is an  excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: panasonic camera
Reviews.Author: JAKE
Reviews.Content: a good ,,basic,,simple product,,good price,,good size,,nice looking ,,good pics,,I love panasonic products,,,I also like the black and chrome trim,,,Very cool !

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Gaia321
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, bought it for my mom. It is very easy to use just take pictures. The quality of the pictures are great, and we like that the battery can be charged separately. It also holds the charge well. All in all it is a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Flimsiest Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: Maciera1579
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for barely three months. It took pretty good pictures, however, I dropped it once and the camera died immediately. Thankfully I purchased the Square Trade Warranty and I was able to get it restored and the camera worked like brand new again...I was so happy. Just a week ago, I dropped it again from a height of about 3 feet and the camera became non-functional again!!! I have had other cameras where I accidentally dropped it and it still worked fine. It's too bad because I really did not have a chance to explore all the capabilities of the Lumix.

Reviews.Title: Shutter is stuck after 3 months of use
Reviews.Author: IM
Reviews.Content: Also - pictures were a good quality at first, then " something happened" and they became very pixelated.  I thought if I spend a little more money, I would get a better camera.  My $60 one still working strong and even though it's not a "16.1 MP", I would take something that work consistently over something that overpromises and underdelivers.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: RJD
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and takes good pictures except in low light there is red eye.  It is suppose to have a setting to reduce that. The old Kodak that died on me completely stopped redeye. Also, the button for snapping the picture should have been where the enlarger button is.  When you use this camera all the time and no other camera, you get used to where the button is.

Reviews.Title: PANASONIC DMC-FH25 16.1MP DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: James Mashburn
Reviews.Content: THE PANASONIC DMC-FH25K IS A GREAT COMPACT DIGITAL CAMERA FOR ON THE GO & QUICK POINT & SHOOT PHOTOS. VERY EASY TO USE & TAKES GREAT PICTURES...I HAVE HAD THIS CAMERA A MONTH & FIND IT TAKES LITTLE EFFORT TO GET IMPRESSIVE RESULTS & LIGHT WEIGHT ENOUGH TO CARRY IN YOU POCKET SO YOU WILL BE READY FOR THE NEXT PHOTO.

Reviews.Title: great camera I recommend.
Reviews.Author: aloyolla
Reviews.Content: I bought this used camera and it arrived in great conditions, like new.In the past I saw many pictures took from  another Lumix and I liked a lot those pictures, is "much more better" than other brand, the colors are real, or close that. Its mode IA Intelligent Auto is very good, I don't have to do nothing extra, the camera adjust itself automatic to the best shot.The price is very good for this type of camera.Thanks Panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: AFGUY
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a Fuji camera that was making me crazy. The fuji had a screen saver and all sorts of delays that caused me to miss photos and just did not make me happy.Never owned a panasonic camera before, but after the routine search and searching the customer reviews ipulled the trigger.  I LOVE this camera!!  It is wicked fast, takes super clear photos and is easy as heck to use.  I turn it on and it is ready to roll.  Plus the battery seems to last forever!!Good:  super fast, good photo quality, small, easy to use.Bad:  None.Overall:  It is perfect aim and shoot camera.  I could not be happier with it!!

Reviews.Title: gut
Reviews.Author: Maggo
Reviews.Content: Panasonic DMC-FH25K 16.1MP Digital Camera with 8x Wide Angle Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Black) hat alles was man braucht, leider nur keine deutsche Bedienungsanleitung, man kommt aber auch so klar.

Reviews.Title: I keep coming back.
Reviews.Author: betweenthepages
Reviews.Content: About 4 years ago I received an older version of this same camera as a Christmas present. For those 4 years that blue little Lumix served me well; it survived all that time in great working condition before finally succumbing when I dropped it one too many times (and believe me, I dropped it constantly; I'm surprised it held up for so long). After briefly trying out a new brand of camera that I sent back with disgust, I decided to return to the old & trusty brand that had worked so well before. And boy, am I glad I did!This beautiful, updated model seems to be (so far) just as perfect as it's predecessor, for many reasons:1) It is the PERFECT portable size to fit in a purse, backpack or even the pocket of your jeans.2) Beautiful color and and design.3) User-friendly interface for changing modes, turning flash on/off, deleting pictures, and every other function you might need.4) Gorgeous picture quality. When taking a photo of my dog, for example, you can see just how luscious and luminescent her fur is, and the gleam in her eyes is clear and crisp. In sum, the photos it takes look great, which leads me to:5) Very flattering picture quality as well! (it must be the flash; either way my skin looks a whole lot better on camera than it does in the mirror!)6) Easy to use buttons/toggles for zoom, taking a picture, turning on/off, deleting, etc. This comes in handy when asking a third party to take a group photo (there's no long struggle trying to find out how to work  the camera).7) It's SO simple to charge (just plug the battery into the charging unit, into the wall, and you're good to go; it's also very easy to remove and replace the battery as well).8) It's easy to upload photos with the simple, no-confusion USB cord (clearly delineates between which end goes in the camera and which goes into the port, which has been a problem with some other devices I own).9) Durability. At least if this model is as sturdy as my last, it will tolerate quite a few tumbles and still looks beautiful despite the scrapes, while never downgrading the quality of the camera itself.10) Simple setup. There's no confusion in setting the time/date, or turning down the volume, etc etc.Suffice to say I'm in love with this little device. Not only is it sleek & nice to look at, but it produces great quality photos/videos and is easy to use as well. I'd recommend it to ANYONE, literally, whether you're looking for a camera to take landscape pictures on vacation, portraits of family members or pets, or self-portraits. It's an all-around, great camera, and the best I've EVER seen to date (certainly out performs all my friends and family members cameras at group occasions!). If you're like me, this is one purchase you're certain to be glad you made--money well spent!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied ..
Reviews.Author: Amit Bhole
Reviews.Content: This product is working very well so far as described. The picture quality is not amazing but it is good enough. The overall performance is worth the price. I will try to update the post if something goes wrong.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use. Great Pictures.
Reviews.Author: lump_kin
Reviews.Content: So far I have just let the camera be in the Intelligent Scene Selector mode. It has just taken great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: B. Ferrante "bonf"
Reviews.Content: I am not a photographer by any means and don't know the technical details about cameras.  But, I value wonderful photos and was searching for a camera that was easy to use. I hit the jackpot with this Lumix. It is compact so that I can keep it in my purse and can take those pictures that you wish you had, but don't because your camera is at home.  It was exactly what I was looking for and more.

Reviews.Title: Great Family Camera
Reviews.Author: Roger Eisentrager "triggermaninKC"
Reviews.Content: Bought this a few weeks ago, for my wife, and she loves it.  If this did not work out, would have bought a Canon (our last digital camera that is now over 2+ years old), and Panasonic did a great job with the design of this, and price was great.  I would recommend the extra battery pack, and 16 gig SD card too.

Reviews.Title: Love Lumix!
Reviews.Author: LL
Reviews.Content: My first Lumix was a DCM model which needed to be relaxed from too much sand & rough use! This model is more sleek & compact but just as great for point & shoot pictures!

Reviews.Title: No fuss good pics
Reviews.Author: Beermongler
Reviews.Content: I wanted to replace my wife's old camera with something that would take better pictures.  I saw this on sale, read the reviews, and decided to give it a shot.The camera takes great pictures right out of the box.  You can take pictures pretty quick without having to wait (using a class 10 SD in the camera).  The pictures aren't blurry from hand shaking and motion shots don't blur most the time either.  The camera is very small and fits in a pocket without a problem. It feels pretty solid and the controls are simple to figure out.Overall this is a great camera for taking quick pictures when out and about if you want something that takes better pictures than a phone but don't want or need the high end camera equipment.

Reviews.Title: Nice little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: QL
Reviews.Content: This is the fastest p&s; camera I've ever laid hands on! You know that "thinking" time that most do between pics? This one doesn't need that AND it captures super-fast pics! Awesome!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Gregory Barney "GAB"
Reviews.Content: Tired of lugging a camera bag around and worrying about it. What a great camera to stick in a small case and put on your belt. Great resolution and color. With the camera using an SD card, I load my pics right from the SD card to my new IPad. Heck, the photos are so great that iPhoto has nothing to modify!!!!!!Love it.

Reviews.Title: buttons
Reviews.Author: button
Reviews.Content: I like the buttons as they are easy to use.  It has a great zoom feature.  I like the shutter button and ease of taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: MsGeode
Reviews.Content: I have not bought a camera in a long time. Had my brothers old Nikon hand me down digital. This camera is great for a not professional like me. Always got blurry pics before, but with this camera pics are great! Easy to use and a lot of great features that I am having fun learning to use. The only draw back is like I read on other reviews, I wish this camera had a view finder. Outside in bright light you can not see the screen very good. Other than that, for the money I think this camera is awesome. Enjoy taking pics of my new granddaughter.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Cutie Turtle
Reviews.Content: I have this camera for 4 months now and I am still loving it. The zoom is awesome! All my pics are great too! I am completely satisfied :)

Reviews.Title: Review DMC-FH25K
Reviews.Author: Jorge A. Pedraza V
Reviews.Content: This camera offers excellent options for taking photo in different moment. With the internal memory it can take limited amount of photos.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Vielhauer
Reviews.Content: My husband purchased this camera for me. I wanted a small one to take on vacation. It fits the bill. Great pictures and easy to use. Glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Dottie J
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for my son,Chris.  He absolutely loves it and all the features that it has.  The picture quality is great and he likes how easy it is to use, along with the convenient, small size.  The price for me was fantastic, especially with all the features it has and the quality of the pictures. It was surely a winner for him at Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: helenmarie
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my purchase. Haven't had a lot of time to use it but so far it seems to be just what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: no prob
Reviews.Author: thepane
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time and there's no problem with the item. Cool cam for touristic reasons, and provides practical usage for photographers to carry it any time.

Reviews.Title: Solid Product, Great Pics, No Nonsense
Reviews.Author: Sparky
Reviews.Content: Simple to operate and superb pictures. What more could you ask for? For the price point, it doesn't get much better than this.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Otis
Reviews.Content: The item arrived earlier than expected. This camera is much better than I thought it would be. The zoom is fantastic and images are very crisp.

Reviews.Title: Solid Camera, great photo quality
Reviews.Author: AbelEko
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the girlfriend after a lot of research, I normally dont use compact digital cameras however this one is great. At a party that we took pictures at I noticed of the four girls with cameras, ours were clearly the better pictures (All relatively new cameras). My one complaint is the proprietary cable it comes with, such a stupid idea.

Reviews.Title: Great Panasonic camera
Reviews.Author: Rita Williams
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement camera for one I loved, but a friend dropped and broke. This newer improved version Panasonic camera is better than the previous camera. It is easier to use and takes great pictures even with the flash off. People think the pictures I have taken are from a more expensive camera. Also it is red. Love it.

Reviews.Title: super fast
Reviews.Author: ram dude
Reviews.Content: just like to say that delivery was awesome I orderd the camera on saturday nite 8pm and it was on my front porch monday noon could not beleive it great job amazon.... the camera is cool all the other reviews were good so I picked this camera to replace my 5year old 10 meg samsung cant wait to get out and do some snapin.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Gordon
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this purchase it is avery nice product, Having a rechargeable battery with charger is a definate plus. We would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Good camera for a great price, I was sent here by another website that noticed about the deal. And oh boy I'm glad I bought it for my wife.

Reviews.Title: better late than never!
Reviews.Author: monca
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, would purchase again. Takes clear sharp pictures. Easy to handle and easy program on how to use.

Reviews.Title: Love my Lumix!
Reviews.Author: S. SMITH
Reviews.Content: I received this as an early Christmas present to myself.  I love it and how easy it is to use.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Camera
Reviews.Author: Ann Marie Gardner
Reviews.Content: I really like this little camera. It is compact and works well.  I love the color as well and it seems to take good pictures.

Reviews.Title: works great.  really fast delivery
Reviews.Author: Eileen A Koelpien
Reviews.Content: Order placed, camera delivered promptly.  No problems at all.  Very happy with the cameraWhat  more can I say?  everything was just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Blessed
Reviews.Content: I picked this camera up just before a 10 day Cruise with my wife as a gift for her Great pictures and she loves it easy to use and no problems with battery life and the picture stabilization help to capture many of great shots even when in a moving car...I looked at many of cameras before I bought this one and it lived up to its reviews......I looked at many of cameras before I bought this one and it lived up to its reviews...Thanks Amazon

Reviews.Title: Lumix
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: Bought for wife. It's compact and easy to use. A great all around camera for every day use and takes quality pics.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly pleased
Reviews.Author: Bmore critic
Reviews.Content: Never having purchased a Panasonic brand camera before, I was sceptical...but very pleased with the camera and the quality of the pictures. Takes great pictures in low light and action shots. Easy to use. Would reccomend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic DMC-FH25A
Reviews.Author: ajaac
Reviews.Content: Camera takes photos quick with minimal shutter lag, but the photos are sometimes fuzzy especially in IA mode.  My daughter has a similar Panasonic and she gets fuzzy photos also.  We had an Olympus before and it took beautiful photos but is had such shutter lag that we missed a lot of shots.  For now we are mostly happy with this camera

Reviews.Title: Takes great pics!!
Reviews.Author: rads11
Reviews.Content: The product was great. It takes great pics but I would say that there are a lot of scene mode selections to choose from which can be good and bad. At times i had to take test pics to make sure i had the right scene picked. but usually if the camera is in normal picture mode it does fine. The camera came with the charger and battery so that was great. it also takes pictures fast too. Money well spent!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Taylor
Reviews.Content: Nice camera and no problems so far. Big, clear screen and opeartes easy. Came with all basic except carrying case, which I think should be included in the price.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: RLM - Calif. "Bandaid55"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to fit in my pocket of take on short trips without lugging my Nikon around.  Easy to work with and the photos are great.  Lots of settings and was way cheaper than a Nikon with roughly the same features.  I like the zoom and pixals capability. And of Amazon delivered promptly.

Reviews.Title: cute and smart camera
Reviews.Author: Devi
Reviews.Content: its amazing one.Really wonderful quality. Worth for this cost.I love it.I thought to give gift to my friends but now I planned to keep it myself.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: go4him
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a small camera that is easy to just pull out and take a picture. Unlike some small cameras, it doesn't stall and it takes nice clear shots. I love it!

Reviews.Title: works for me
Reviews.Author: Thomas G. Britsch
Reviews.Content: Looked for a small digital camera with ease of use and with positive reviews yet not too expensive. This was exactly what I expected. Works well and is easily carried around.

Reviews.Title: Lots of features
Reviews.Author: Carthew
Reviews.Content: Not a great user of cameras but this one seems the joker in the pack for ease of use. Lots of features.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: MIR
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, easy to use and it takes great pictures.  The auto focus, is great, and makes picture taking easy.  I wish it used standard batteries, but the battery does last a long time.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: teamcharles92
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice camera for the price takes excellent pictures and is very easy to use.I would recommend to anyone who wants a nice compact camera.

Reviews.Title: Lumix
Reviews.Author: William Craw
Reviews.Content: Excellent piece of kit. The only drawback is the lack of a view-finder - difficult to see and focus in bright sunlight, and there's a lot of the latter where I live. Maybe there's a way to compensate for this? Otherwise, my Lumix is an amazing advance on its predecessor which I dropped once too often.

Reviews.Title: awesome point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Leah Beech
Reviews.Content: Perfect point and shoot camera, good color, easy to use, compact. It was also a very good price! I have used it for the holidays and have some awesome shots!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara Campbell "Rural librarian"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.. It's so easy to use. The pictures are great. Anyone,even technically challenged can use this camera.

Reviews.Title: groblay
Reviews.Author: blay
Reviews.Content: Excelente camara para tener un precio tan bajo, realiza unas fotos de extraordinaria calidad a la vez que es muy facil de utilizar.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: David V.
Reviews.Content: I learned about this product when talking with my co-worker.  Besides that my brother had one too.  The best thing I like is Intelligent auto and 8X wide angle image.

Reviews.Title: works great!
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Fiji.  I have an underwater Canon camera that I have found to be unreliable.  It stops working from time to time (arrrgh!) and I didn't want to miss a single shot.  I wanted something inexpensive, small and simple.  This camera is so easy to use and takes great pics.  (I've received many compliments on my pictures so far.)  It fits perfectly in my hand, the zoom is great.  My much more expensive Canon took one picture and died.  Again.  Without this camera I would have had one picture of Fiji!  I haven't bothered to read the manual, and I have over 400 amazing shots of my vacay.  I put it in a ziploc in my dry bag and took it kayaking in the rain.  I took it out in the heat, in the sand.  Again, a million times better than my waterproof, shock proof, temperture tough Canon.  I think I'll look at Panasonics underwater camera next.  I should have bought it in the first place.  If you want a simple point and shoot, you won't go wrong with this.  It's a lot of camera for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Kennedy "Her0Zer0"
Reviews.Content: Very nice little camera. Takes sharp pictures. Color is very vibrant and nice. Lots of nice features. I wuse it to take product photography and it works great for this. Was also very nice to have around on a recent trip. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: always striving
Reviews.Content: I really like it. It's easy to use and I'm happy with the quality. More intuitive than the Canon I dropped...

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Conrad McConrad
Reviews.Content: I purchased this after owning a ZR3 camera, but a toddler broke it. This is very close to that camera except instead of dial, it has a mode button which changes the shape a bit. This camera also has more MP. I recently took some outdoor pictures at night and I really think (more anecdotal) that the flash on this camera is better as well. Every picture I've taken so far (around 100) has turned out great. Very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix
Reviews.Author: J. Emmerthal
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I had to purchase extra memory but it is totally worth it. It takes great pictures and is easy to down load. It is small enough to slip in my pocket and go.

Reviews.Title: Excelent camera
Reviews.Author: Ama
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because the reviews that I read. And they were right. It take great pictures and great videos. My daughter is the one that use the camera and she is no complaining. I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent pictures - make sure you let i focus
Reviews.Author: Timothy Davis "Tim"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes excellent photos - scenery or people.  So far I like using Normal Picture modevs. intelligent Auto for most shots.  The focus is very good as long as you let it focus before pushing the button all the way down.  Controls are easily understandable and the menus are a breeze to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality at a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Georgia Pat
Reviews.Content: I've waiting a couple of months before giving my review, and I am still getting acquainted with the camera.  I have not used it for videos, nor have I tried every mode setting.  However, I have used it extensively for still photographs, including close-ups, and am very pleased with the ease of use and quality of the photographs.I did have to get a new (inexpensive) card reader, as the built in slot of my older computer would not read the SDHC card. My next purchase will be an additional battery pack.As it turned out, it wasn't such a bad thing that I tripped over a curb,  and my old Olympus digital camera took the full brunt of the fall onto the concrete! This camera was a fraction of the price I paid for the old one, and I love the red color!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the buck
Reviews.Author: Ohio Joe
Reviews.Content: This camera fit my needs and price range nicely.  I wanted something small and easy to carry but also good enough to take decent pictures.  I like the telescopic range and it is easy to switch from still frame to movie if desired.  It has a menu with multiple options for shooting under various circumstances but this takes a bunch of time to set up.  I use it only in auto mode as I want to just click and shoot and the pictures are great.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for the price
Reviews.Author: Lindsay
Reviews.Content: I'm leaving 4 stars because it's not the highest quality camera, but for the price, it just can't be beat.  I had a strict budget for a point and shoot, and this was perfect for what I wanted.  Uploads to my computer are quick and easy, battery life is great, picture quality is very good, and it's small enough to fit in a clutch.  If you're on a budget but you don't want to sacrifice quality, this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Looking something to replace my old Samsung S1050
Reviews.Author: Roel Lzn
Reviews.Content: In comparison with my 4 years Samsung, who was heavy, slow and power hungry, this one is decent for the pricePros:Good optical zoomFast shutter speedIntelligent autoNice scene modesGreat Image stabilizationDecent battery lifeEasy to useEtc...Cons:16mp doesn't help to take much better pics than my old 10mp SamsungLCD no better neitherI've chosen the violet color, because too many already buy the blue one, lolI dint try the 720 video yet, or the software that came with my cameraI purchased a core logic case, with memory foam interior, and Wintec 16gb class 10 memory flash at Fry'sGood camera for teens, mom's, dad's, and casual photographers ...

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Digital Camera from Amazon
Reviews.Author: KimW
Reviews.Content: I read many of the reviews before I bought this camera and they were extremely helpful.  This is a great camera, picture quality is good, speed is a bit slow but good for this size of camera.  Fits very conveniently in a small purse or pocket.  The only downfall of this camera is the battery life.  If you take a lot of pictures at one time it will run out of battery.  I would suggest an extra battery to charge while you are using the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, though not good for night time shots
Reviews.Author: Nell K
Reviews.Content: I love the camera because the functions are so easy to use. It is not at all complicated and has lots of different options. I try to take pictures on horseback, and can easily work with the camera while moving. On auto most of the shots were REALLY nice... beautiful shots, I have some that look professional. A few of the shots under auto were fuzzy... you have to be patient and wait a little for the camera to figure out what it needs to focus on under this option. I imagine that the camera was adjusting since I was moving when I took the shot. If you need to take a quick shot of something fast, use normal view or if you want to chose a specific photo option, your target for the photo might move by the time you flip through a couple screens to chose face, animal, candle light, etc as the specific type of photo you want. This is true of most cameras though... and like I said, it is easy to find what you need. I tried video and shots of a deer under regular and night.. with my porch light on it. I could see the deer but the camera couldn't even when I messed with different options. Some pictures under certain options showed the deer some... but not that well at all, I was disappointed with this. The camera has been durable for the month I have had it so far, and the software was easy to use as well.  As far as amazon goes, they sent me an e-mail to pick up the camera at the post office as it needed to be signed for... but it showed up the next day via mail and was left in my mail box. Just a heads up... could have been the post office or amazon that got that one messed up. In case it happened to rain and your mail box is outside like mine, be careful to get the camera when amazon says it is coming.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Love to read
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small camera to keep in my purse.  I have been very happy with the photos of my granddaughter and the video of her, although it took me a couple of tries to get something useful!  I'm sure I haven't tested all of the features, but for something that falls in the point and shoot category while taking higher quality photos...this works well!

Reviews.Title: The best picture quality possible with a point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Varun Mittal
Reviews.Content: Hi,I was a little hesitant buying a Panasonic camera at first, simply because Panasonic is not the biggest name in Camera industry. But I am glad I made this purchase. It has so many options for the price. One great thing about this camera is that its picture quality under low light conditions is really good. Generally with other cameras if you take a picture in dark with flash on, the things close by become bright and you get an almost black background. With this camera, somehow I did not have that problem. The light was spread evenly and I was able to capture exactly what I wanted.Another important factor here is the 16 MP. You will know the difference immediately. I viewed the pictures that I took recently on my 47" HD TV and even on full screen, there was not a single blur photo (of about the 1000 I took on my trip).The only drawback I could find is that each picture is about 8 MB, which means you at least need to get a 8 GB memory card if not more.All in all, highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: pretty ok little point n shoot!
Reviews.Author: John H. Rowe
Reviews.Content: Price was right. Convenience & size and quality ok.I'm a former Pro it will not replace my "real camera"but great for those "happy-snaps"....

Reviews.Title: Not the best battery life
Reviews.Author: Katherine J. Singler
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, but it has a pretty short battery life.  Also doesn't have color stitch, which I wanted to play around with.  Does have many other settings, and really like the pictures that are produced.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use. The zoom is amazing for the price of the camera. A very good point and shoot with an excellent price. It is easy to use right out of the box, nothing too difficult, and small enough to put in your pocket to have on the go.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed for my limited ability
Reviews.Author: florhome
Reviews.Content: I read reviews before purchasing this camera and am very pleased. It has a quick shutter speed that I need to take pictures of my grandchildren and I also like the weight of this camera. I wasn't sure, but was pleasantly surprised, that the battery came with the camera. It was a great buy and I also used my Amazon points to make it an even better buy.

Reviews.Title: Great every-day use camera for the price
Reviews.Author: James P. Malone "SwimJim504"
Reviews.Content: This is the second one of these we have had (first one we dropped and broke!). They are great for the price. They have all sorts of cool functions, zoom is good. For people like us - folks who just want a very good digital camera for every use, like taking pictures of people, scenery, ball games, pets, etc - it really is the perfect camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Lynn Camp
Reviews.Content: This camera is great!  Love everything about it!  If you are shopping for a camera for personal use, this is the one for you!

Reviews.Title: Great Product so far on my Trip
Reviews.Author: Nites
Reviews.Content: The camera has been great, the only thing is that there is no zoom for the video but other than that the camera has been great.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for a decent price
Reviews.Author: Amelia
Reviews.Content: So far I'm fairly happy with this camera.  Takes great pictures in and outdoors, and some great quality videos for a small camera.  Takes pictures fairly quickly too - not too much loading time after taking a shot.  Haven't had any problems with it.I guess if you're used to a cybershot camera then it may be mildly annoying to get used to the different interface but I'm used to it by now so I don't find it an issue.  It's really not that difficult to figure out.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: CREDIC1 "DAD"
Reviews.Content: I don,t understand the previous review saying it takes poor indoor pics . I have a friend and along with me who purchased this camera and love it. We purchased this for our trip and stayed at a condo and took many shots indoor and they all look great. Same at indoor resturants. Outdoor are clearer yet. I think he might have got a defective one. Even best buy have good reviws on it ... Its quick and the movie mode is great also at 720o.. My friends son takes karate and he showed me many indoor shots he took in a gym (with fast movement) and they look clear and in focus.... The battery last long also...Would recommend...

Reviews.Title: Just Ok.
Reviews.Author: Buckshot
Reviews.Content: The camera appearance is good.  It takes very good pictures I will say that.  What I don't like about it is the switches, seem cheap, makes me wonder about how durable they will be over time.  Labeling of switches and buttons are very hard to see also.
